pageContext.public_note: Registration through Fremont Recreation opens 1/15 online (Barcode: 270675).
pageContext.course_type_long_description: Join us for a full-day of engineering and exploring your craziest ideas!  Start off the day with Play-Well TEKnologies and tens of thousands of LEGO® and applying real-world concepts in physics, engineering, and architecture through projects like: Forklifts, Houseboats, Mini Golf Courses, and the London Tower Bridge Design.  Then re-engineer LEGO vehicles into mechanized machines that can traverse challenging obstacles, battle against fellow bots, and take on Play-Well Instructors colossal creations!
pageContext.course_type_name: STEM + Bash 'Em Bots w/ LEGO® Materials: FULL DAY CAMP
